interfaces

Interface Character

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, Moveable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Monster, Player
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterEntity, MonsterEntity, PlayerEntity

    public interface Character
extends Moveable
    Author:
    Tim Gastrell, laudernich1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pickupable getHand()
      Returns the object currently in the players hand
      int getLives()
      Returns the amount of health the character has left
      boolean isAlive()
      Checks if the player has more than 0 lives

      • Methods inherited from interface interfaces.Moveable

        moveBy, moveTo, tick

      • Methods inherited from interface interfaces.Entity

        getBoundingBox, getHeight, getImage, getType, getWidth, getX, getY, setImage

    • Method Detail

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Checks if the player has more than 0 lives
        Returns:
        true if the player is alive

      • getLives

        int getLives()
        Returns the amount of health the character has left
        Returns:
        the int of the characters remaining lives

      • getHand

        Pickupable getHand()
        Returns the object currently in the players hand
        Returns:
        the pickupable object in the hand
